summary:
Retexture of spellbreaker following colour scheme from the oblivion version
based on HD texture pack.
Increased resolutoin of specular map.

yes im an oblivion fan!!
descriptionHtml:
[left][color=#6aa84f]
DESCRIPTION:[/color]


Retexture of spellbreaker following colour scheme from the oblivion version.
Its resolutions is:
2k diffusemap
2k normalmap (from hd texture pack)
1k specularmap (_m.dds file)

Thanks to bethesda for awesome HD texture pack,that was used as a base.

this mod basically changes the colursof spellbreaker shield and tries to give it a little cleaner look.

install as you wish,all u have to do is say yes when asked to replace files.

About shininess it may require some AMB cubemap.im not totally sure...

Â 
[/left][center]
[/center]
author: zzjay
